top_comment.text:
Wow, you upity fuckers need to die. Unsubbing right now, always report with 
this patronising know-it-all'y tone, ughhh, I'm done.﻿
top_comment.author: Malvuu

top_comment.text:
Does anyone know a way to block these guys from showing up in youtube 
results? Tired of you guys tricking me with thumbnails then i click and 
it's not the vid!﻿
top_comment.author: ShivFrost

comments.text:
+Emotional Contagion so you unsubscribed, yet still watch their videos 
anyway? Not only do you watch them, but you also read the comments under 
their videos? Not only do you watch the videos and read the comments, but 
you watch the videos, read the comments, and also take time to reply to 
comments on the videos that you claim to hate and not want to watch.

The way your mind works is gods own secret mystery I guess.
comments.author: J Dore

comments.text: You guys could always read the youtube account that posted the video.
comments.author: DarkKnightofHeaven

comments.text:
I unsubbed ages ago. Can't stand Chenk & how he seems to 'have the world 
down' with an opinion on everything. i clicked this for Russel Brand. Do my 
best to try and avoid TYT. They're near unavoidable but vigilance is your 
best deterent from Chenk.
On the bright side, Ana always looks hawt :)
comments.author: Emotional Contagion

top_comment.text:
I'm not a big fan of Russell Brand's humour but I do applaud him for his 
patience under the provocative circumstances.﻿
top_comment.author: Debbie Smith

comments.text:
+joshua grobelch Near the end of the video I realized just how hard it must 
be for a Christian to justify tolerance of homosexuals. One side(typically, 
the gay Christians) thinks the tolerance bit is more important and that the 
part in Leviticus should just be ignored, while the other side has the 
opposite opinion. At the end of the day, they're both wrong because their 
religion is internally inconsistent.
It's so much easier to just say "you should tolerate gays because there's 
no reason not to."
comments.author: Evan Goers

comments.text:
i wasn't either until i saw him interview the crazies from westboro church. 
 i thought it was great.
OFFICIAL Video: Russell Brand Interviews Westboro Baptist Church
comments.author: joshua grobelch

top_comment.text:
TYT, Love ya, but why the labels? Russell Brand is a Progressive? No he's 
not a fucking Progressive, he speaks the god damn truth. I know we don't 
get anything like that from the Right but I don't know why speaking the 
truth and putting forward alternative ideas for failing systems and Ideals 
gets you labelled a Progressive. He's not, he is just a man with common 
sense and a sense of justice.﻿
top_comment.author: Matt Peace

comments.text:
I think what you mean to say is that his views don't really align with 
something we can label in our political spectrum.
comments.author: nr1341

comments.text: The truth is pretty fucking progressive these days.
comments.author: Jordan Evans
